title: BONUS EPISODE: John Boyega On Black Actors In Hollywood, Michael K. Williams, Heritage + 'Woman King'
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Actor John Boyega sits down with Ebro in the Morning for a great conversation about race, the perception of race in Hollywood, the passing of Michael K. Williams, the backlash he received as a star on 'Star Wars', response to his social media posts, his Nigerian heritage, and more! 'Woman King' is in theaters now! 

SIGN UP FOR OROCASH HERE: https://www.oro.fund/

Subscribe to "Captains & Majors" on iTunes, Spotify, and Amazon.
